dependencies.description:
Arrow is a Python library that offers a sensible and human-friendly
approach to creating, manipulating, formatting and converting dates,
times and timestamps. It implements and updates the datetime type,
plugging gaps in functionality and providing an intelligent module API
that supports many common creation scenarios. Simply put, it helps you
work with dates and times with fewer imports and a lot less code.
dependencies.name: py-arrow

dependencies.description:
Ultra-lightweight pure Python package to check if a file is binary or
text.
dependencies.name: py-binaryornot

dependencies.description: Python composable command line interface toolkit.
dependencies.name: py-click

dependencies.description: Clean single-source support for Python 3 and 2
dependencies.name: py-future

dependencies.description:
Jinja2 is a template engine written in pure Python. It provides a Django
inspired non-XML syntax but supports inline expressions and an optional
sandboxed environment.
dependencies.name: py-jinja2

dependencies.description: Jinja2 Extension for Dates and Times
dependencies.name: py-jinja2-time

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: A lightweight YAML Parser for Python
dependencies.name: py-poyo

dependencies.description: A Python Slugify application that handles Unicode
dependencies.name: py-python-slugify

dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.
dependencies.name: py-pyyaml

dependencies.description:
Rich is a Python library for rich text and beautiful formatting in the
terminal.
dependencies.name: py-rich

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

description:
A command-line utility that creates projects from cookiecutters (project
templates). E.g. Python package projects, jQuery plugin projects.
name: py-cookiecutter

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
